data.message:
I can't find any solution anywhere on getting Official Music Pages verified for clients in Ireland, it is causing quite a few problems as false and misleading pages are being created by fans 😞
I just keep getting: This feature isn't available to everyone right now.
I have been getting this for over a year which is absolutely ridiculous  ?

replies.message: Hi Alan. You can learn more about the process for verifying Pages here: http://bit.ly/2nVCWHs. Please keep in mind that not all Pages are currently eligible for verification. We're constantly working to improve the Facebook experience for everyone and if there's something specific we can do to improve yours, please let us know at: http://bit.ly/2on4GQJ. -Jessica

Facebook , Hi Jessica, that response is no help for the many high end music artists that are dealing with fan generated pages, this feature is available to many other countries to pages with less than 1000 likes, the clients I represent have in excess of 100,000 organic likes and can't get verified.
